result.title: Thematic Workshops âCross-sectoral interactions and synergiesâ
result.description: Five thematic workshops to share and exchange the findings and experience with cross-sectoral cooperation in the different case study regions. Special attention will be given to the nature of cross-sectoral cooperation (e.g. the actors / organisations / businesses involved, cooperation strategies and arrangements, linkages between rural and urban activities), the impact on socio-economic development (e.g. creation of value added and job growth) and the factors enabling or hindering cross-sectoral cooperation and synergies.
